entry.title: $2495 // Brand new - Gorgeous 2 Bedroom 1bath with In unit Laundry!
entry.content:
Brand new - Gorgeous 2 Bedroom 1bath with In unit Laundry!
Just two short blocks to HOTT FRANKLIN AVE!
Steps to Eastern Parkway, A, C & 3 train

APARTMENT FEATURES:
- Beautiful seperate kitchen with all SS appliances and high-end finishes Including Microwave/Dishwaser
- 2 Large bedrooms all with closets
- fully tiled bathroom with deep soaking tub and good storage
- Tall ceilings
- Hardwood floors
- W/D in unit!
- Heat and hot water included
- Elevator Building
- Live in super

This unit is conveniently located off of Nostrand Ave & steps to Frankin Ave which features some of the best Shops, health food stores, cafes, bars and much more Crown Heights has to offer
For more info or to schedule a viewing contact Benny today! @
646-963-5926
Benny@zjamarealty.com
